main event: A person spotted an unidentified object circling and then standing at high altitude over Piqua, Ohio in 1957.
interesting points: The object appeared to be aircraft-like but showed no vapor trail.
The observer stated that it was an aircraft.
The object was visible for 8-10 seconds.
The object was described as a silver, dull-looking object.
The observer estimated the object's speed to be around 1,620 mph.
